alert.note: Alert for Nye; White Pine (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 06 at 5:24AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Nevada and south central Nevada, including the following counties, in northeast Nevada, White Pine. In south central Nevada, Nye. * WHEN...Until 1115 AM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 524 AM PDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.4 and 0.8 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.2 to 0.4 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Blue Eagle Ranch, Duckwater, Currant and Sunnyside. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
